name: Michelle DePass
coverLetter:
I am looking for part-time, weekend work as a way to hep pay college expenses for my son. I'm a quick learner, and have grown cannabis years ago for my own use. I'm a team player, reliable and have solid transportation. Willing to travel up to 20 miles from downtown Portland.

This work is quite different than what I do between 9 and 5 weekdays, and I look forward to gaining speed over time!
contact: You may contact me at depass.michelle@gmail.com
